Lovely refinished fir floors on the main, over-height ceilings, beautiful mountain views, large dining room, totally updated chef's kitchen with induction range and the brightest eat-in-kitchen nook overlooking your super sunny, private, oversized south facing deck, perfect for entertaining! Up you have a large master, 3rd bedroom and spa-like bath. Down features a magazine worthy 1-bedroom suite with oak floors, updated kitchen, tons of light, and tons of storage. Bonus fabulous garage/shop with 60 amp sub panel. Updates are too many to mention! The home was completely rewired and upgraded: 200 amp panel, new roof, plumbing, hot water on demand, new drain tiles, new sewer lines, washer/dryer hook ups on main floor, lathe and plaster removed, new drywall and insulation, new skylights. More info on realtor's website.
